price: Él es solo un ser humano que ha inventado una gran mentira acerca de Dios, y no le vamos a creer".
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban wamā naḥnu lahu bimu'minīna
